snippet: The 36-time Dutch champions sit ... Steijn joined the club from Sparta Rotterdam in June 2023 following the departure of Johnny Heitinga and signed a contract until 2026, but won just two of his 11 games in charge...

title: Steijn latest in a long line of Ajax players and managers with past links to Sparta
snippet: Ajax, Sparta Rotterdam, and Maurice Steijn have reached an agreement concerning the trainer's move to Ajax. Steijn will sign a three-year contract in Amsterdam from 1 July 2023 till 30 June 2026. Steijn (Den Haag, 20 November 1973) will become ...

title: Steijn: A man from The Hague in Amsterdam service
snippet: Maurice Steijn is moments away from his debut as head coach of Ajax 1. With fellow Hagueneses and former Ajax players Aad de Mos, Martin Jol and Cedric van der Gun, we discuss his move to Amsterdam, Hagueneses at Ajax and the expectations.
